languages.text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the area of effect to attack the nearest ally if they fail a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит <u>(от 10 до 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} составляют 20%. Каждая цель в области действия совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно атакует ближайшего союзника.

traits.locale_text: Deals 10-15 toxic damage with 20% armour penetration and 20% dodge reduction. It immediately provokes each character in the area of effect to attack the nearest ally if they fail a Willpower resistance test.

It immediately provokes each character in the area of effect to attack the nearest ally if they fail a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

Каждая цель в области действия совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно атакует ближайшего союзника.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the area of effect to attack the nearest ally if they fail a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Наносит 10–15 токсичного урона. Пробитие брони и снижение уклонения составляют 20%. Каждая цель в области действия совершает проверку Воли на сопротивление и в случае провала немедленно атакует ближайшего союзника.

Наносит 10–15 токсичного урона. Пробитие брони и снижение уклонения составляют 20%. Каждая цель в области действия совершает проверку Воли на сопротивление и в случае провала немедленно атакует ближайшего союзника.

languages.text: 对目标区域造成<u>10-15</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。影响区域内的所有角色都需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的角色会立刻攻击距离最近的盟友。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the area of effect to attack the nearest ally if they fail a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 造成10-15点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。此次攻击获得20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与20%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}影响区域{/g}内的所有角色都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的角色会立刻攻击距离最近的盟友。

languages.text: 20%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を持つ<u>10～15</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる各キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなかった場合、直ちに最も近い味方を攻撃するよう誘発。
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} to attack the nearest ally if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 10～15の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}を20%、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を20%付与。{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる各キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなかった場合、直ちに最も近い味方を攻撃するよう誘発。

languages.text: Inflige <u>(de 10 a 15)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} con un 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Provoca que todo personaje dentro del {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} ataque al aliado más cercano si falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} to attack the nearest ally if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Causa 10-15 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} con un 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Provoca que todo personaje dentro del {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} ataque al aliado más cercano si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.

languages.text: Verursacht <u>(von 10 bis 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} mit 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g}. Provoziert augenblicklich jeden Charakter im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g}, den nächsten Verbündeten anzugreifen, sofern eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} fehlschlägt.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} to attack the nearest ally if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Fügt 10-15 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} mit 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} zu. Provoziert augenblicklich jeden Charakter im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Effektbereich{/g}, den nächsten Verbündeten anzugreifen, sofern eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} fehlschlägt.

languages.text: Inflige <u>entre 10 et 15</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}. Provoque immédiatement l'attaque de l'allié le plus proche par chaque personnage présent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} en cas d'échec à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. It immediately provokes each character in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} to attack the nearest ally if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 10 à 15 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}. Provoque immédiatement l'attaque de l'allié le plus proche par chaque personnage présent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} en cas d'échec à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}.
